XRPoseTransform.summary:
The transform read-only attribute of the
interface is a object providing
the position and orientation of the pose relative to the base
as specified when the pose was obtained by calling
.
XRPoseTransform.value:
An which provides the position and orientation of the
relative to the to which this
XRPose is aligned. This is the same pose that's returned by the frame's
method.
